name: Martin Luther King, Jr.
quote: We must accept finite disappointment, but never lose infinite hope.

name: Helen Keller
quote: Your success and happiness lies in you. Resolve to keep happy, and your joy and you shall form an invincible host against difficulties.

name: Socrates
quote: True wisdom comes to each of us when we realize how little we understand about life, ourselves, and the world around us.

name: Frederick Douglass
quote: Without a struggle, there can be no progress.

name: Eleanor Roosevelt
quote: You must do the things you think you cannot do.

name: Oscar Wilde
quote: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.

name: Maya Angelou
quote: If you find it in your heart to care for somebody else, you will have succeeded.

name: Georgia O'Keeffe
quote: I decided that if I could paint that flower in a huge scale, you could not ignore its beauty.

name: Mae West
quote: You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough.

name: J.K. Rowling
quote: If you want to know what a man's like, take a good look at how he treats his inferiors, not his equals.

name: Jim Henson
quote: Beauty is in the eye of the beholder and it may be necessary from time to time to give a stupid or misinformed beholder a black eye.

name: Oscar Wilde
quote: I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying.
